title: Interactive: State Cost Estimates of Legislation (Center on Budget and Policy Priorities)
text: ( Source : Center on Budget and Policy Priorities) State policymakers need accurate information about the cost of spending- and tax-related proposals to make good decisions about them. Nearly all states produce a cost estimate of bills,
